amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce provisions which allow unions to solicit members and dues at VA facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the exception in clause (iii) of section 1.218(a)(8) of title 38, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 225 (Roll no. 224).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 225 (Roll no. 224).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Gosar.
